summary: Two young Spanish men, with a university education, are tired of unemployment and decide to move to Germany. But soon they will find out that finding a better living is not as easy as they expected.
cast: Yon González|Julián López|Blanca Suárez|Malena Alterio|Úrsula Corberó|Miki Esparbé|Younes Bachir|Javier Cámara|Carmen Machi|José Sacristán|Arantxa Aranguren|Elena Rivera|Luis Fabra|Arturo Valls|Alberto Chicote|Jorge Anes|Juan Carlos Peredit|Fernando Ustarroz|Svante|Abdulelah Hussein|Joachim Paul Assböck|Mónica Hernández|Oscar Pretzel|Roman Vogdt|Marta Casielles|Mamen Vázquez|Claus Breitfeld|Christian Stamm|Markus Oberhauser|Juan Khun|Víctor Huerta|Gabriele Rausch|Richard Pena|Luismi Fernández|Juanlo Prada Garrudo|Julio Vergne|Antonio Sánchez|Oriol Capel|David S. Olivas|Marta Murillo|Carmen Sánchez|Roberto Miguel|Guillermo Navajo|Joaquim Guedes|David Akinloye
title: Perdiendo el norte
